# AudioReader.AsyncBuffers

**Structure**

An async sequence of audio buffers read from an audio file.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AsyncBuffers
```

## Overview

This sequence allows iterating through the file only once.

## Getting the count

- **count**: The number of audio buffers in the file.

## Getting the url

- **url**: The audio file URL, used when throwing an error.

## Creating an iterator

- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Constructs an iterator.
- **AudioReader.AsyncBuffers.Iterator**: An async iterator of audio buffers.

## Managing buffers

- **AudioReader.Configuration**: The configuration of the audio reader.
- **AudioReader.MicrophoneAsyncBuffers**: An async sequence of audio frames.

## Conforms To

- AsyncSequence
- TemporalSequence
